content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":218272,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それでも尚、将軍に感謝し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even so, still grateful to the general,"},{"lineNumber":218273,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今までついてきたのです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"we have followed him up to now..."},{"lineNumber":218274,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あなたの傍で共に戦えたこと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Being able to fight alongside you,"},{"lineNumber":218275,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私は、私達は嬉しく思います……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I, we, are truly grateful..."},{"lineNumber":218276,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ですから……どうか、顔をお上げ下さい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"So... please, raise your head..."},{"lineNumber":218277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……アレコズイン」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Arekozine."},{"lineNumber":218278,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":218279,"originalJapaneseLine":"「君達、先程言っていたな……","translatedEnglishLine":"You all said earlier..."},{"lineNumber":218280,"originalJapaneseLine":"　我らが降伏すれば、我らを無事に","translatedEnglishLine":"If we surrender, you will safely"},{"lineNumber":218281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物界まで送ってくれるというのは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"escort us back to the monster realm..."},{"lineNumber":218282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アアン？　今更そんな都合のいい話が――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Huh? Now suddenly such a convenient offer—"},{"lineNumber":218283,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい！　はい！　もちろんです！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes! Yes! Of course!"},{"lineNumber":218284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おま……」","translatedEnglishLine":"You..."},{"lineNumber":218285,"originalJapaneseLine":"「降伏していただければ、","translatedEnglishLine":"If you surrender,"},{"lineNumber":218286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆さんを必ず無事に送り返すと、","translatedEnglishLine":"I promise to definitely send all of you back safely,"},{"lineNumber":218287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　約束させて頂きます！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I give you my word!"},{"lineNumber":218288,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、いいでしょ？　ね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"So, that's good, right? Right?"},{"lineNumber":218289,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、わあったよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, very well..."},{"lineNumber":218290,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"...I see."},{"lineNumber":218291,"originalJapaneseLine":"「手厚い待遇に、感謝を述べさせて頂く……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I express my gratitude for your generous treatment..."},{"lineNumber":218292,"originalJapaneseLine":"「副官アレコズインよ……","translatedEnglishLine":"Deputy Arekozine..."},{"lineNumber":218293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今度こそ、これが最期の命令だ」","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, this shall be my final order."},{"lineNumber":218294,"originalJapaneseLine":"「残りの者を率いて、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lead the rest,"},{"lineNumber":218295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　武装解除し、投降し……","translatedEnglishLine":"disarm them, and surrender..."},{"lineNumber":218296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後はこの者達に委ねよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, leave everything to these people..."},{"lineNumber":218297,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆に伝えてくれ」","translatedEnglishLine":"Tell everyone,"},{"lineNumber":218298,"originalJapaneseLine":"「我らの戦いはようやく終わったのだと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that our fight has finally come to an end..."},{"lineNumber":218299,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes!"},{"lineNumber":218300,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐ、ぐぶっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, guh...!"},{"lineNumber":218301,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダルソンが口から血を吐く。","translatedEnglishLine":"Dalson spits blood from his mouth."},{"lineNumber":218302,"originalJapaneseLine":"それだけでなく、ダルソンの胸の斬り傷が","translatedEnglishLine":"Not only that, the cut on Dalson's chest"},{"lineNumber":218303,"originalJapaneseLine":"独りでに開き血を噴き出した。","translatedEnglishLine":"opened by itself, spewing blood."},{"lineNumber":218304,"originalJapaneseLine":"「傷が開いた……","translatedEnglishLine":"The wound has reopened..."},{"lineNumber":218305,"originalJapaneseLine":"　いや、思い出したか」","translatedEnglishLine":"No, did he remember?"},{"lineNumber":218306,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しょ、将軍……」","translatedEnglishLine":"G-General..."},{"lineNumber":218307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや、いい……","translatedEnglishLine":"No, it's fine..."},{"lineNumber":218308,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これもまた、思い出しただけ……","translatedEnglishLine":"This is just another memory returning..."},{"lineNumber":218309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今までが異常だったのだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Until now, it was all abnormal..."},{"lineNumber":218310,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆に感謝を……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Thank you all..."},{"lineNumber":218311,"originalJapaneseLine":"「副官アレコズイン……","translatedEnglishLine":"Deputy Arekozine..."},{"lineNumber":218312,"originalJapaneseLine":"　後は、任せたぞ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I leave the rest to you..."},{"lineNumber":218313,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Yes!"},{"lineNumber":218314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「必ずや！　必ずや命令を全うします！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will definitely! I will definitely carry out your orders!"},{"lineNumber":218315,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぉ、ぉおおお……ダルソン様ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"O-ohhh... Lord Dalson..."},{"lineNumber":218316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍！　将軍！　うわぁぁあ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"General! General! Waaah!"},{"lineNumber":218317,"originalJapaneseLine":"周りにいた兵達が涙ながらに、","translatedEnglishLine":"The soldiers around him, with tears,"},{"lineNumber":218318,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダルソンに敬礼を送る。","translatedEnglishLine":"saluted Dalson."},{"lineNumber":218319,"originalJapaneseLine":"「皆……今まですまなかった……","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone... I'm sorry for everything until now..."},{"lineNumber":218320,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ゆっくりと……休んでくれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Please... rest slowly..."},{"lineNumber":218321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さらばだ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Farewell..."},{"lineNumber":218322,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍ダルソンの体が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The body of Monster General Dalson,"},{"lineNumber":218323,"originalJapaneseLine":"空気に溶けるようにかき消えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"dissolved into the air as if melting away."},{"lineNumber":218324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………へ？　消え、た？」","translatedEnglishLine":"...Huh? Disappeared?"},{"lineNumber":218325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え……","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh..."},{"lineNumber":218326,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それじゃあ……まさか……","translatedEnglishLine":"Then... no way..."},{"lineNumber":218327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ダルソン将軍って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"General Dalson is..."},{"lineNumber":218328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ゆ、幽霊！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"A-a ghost!?"},{"lineNumber":218329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":218330,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私達も最初は気づかなかったのだがな……","translatedEnglishLine":"At first, we hadn’t realized either..."},{"lineNumber":218331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「将軍は15年前、深手を負い、","translatedEnglishLine":"The general was grievously wounded 15 years ago,"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それでも尚、将軍に感謝し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so, still grateful to the general,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までついてきたのです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: we have followed him up to now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あなたの傍で共に戦えたこと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Being able to fight alongside you,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私は、私達は嬉しく思います……」
「ですから……どうか、顔をお上げ下さい……」
我らが降伏すれば、我らを無事に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we surrender, you will safely

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物界まで送ってくれるというのは……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: escort us back to the monster realm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アアン？　今更そんな都合のいい話が――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Now suddenly such a convenient offer—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はい！　はい！　もちろんです！」
皆さんを必ず無事に送り返すと、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I promise to definitely send all of you back safely,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「手厚い待遇に、感謝を述べさせて頂く……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I express my gratitude for your generous treatment...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度こそ、これが最期の命令だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, this shall be my final order.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後はこの者達に委ねよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, leave everything to these people...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「我らの戦いはようやく終わったのだと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that our fight has finally come to an end...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダルソンが口から血を吐く。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dalson spits blood from his mouth.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それだけでなく、ダルソンの胸の斬り傷が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not only that, the cut on Dalson's chest

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 独りでに開き血を噴き出した。
これもまた、思い出しただけ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is just another memory returning...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までが異常だったのだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until now, it was all abnormal...
I leave the rest to you...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「必ずや！　必ずや命令を全うします！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will definitely! I will definitely carry out your orders!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「将軍！　将軍！　うわぁぁあ！」
周りにいた兵達が涙ながらに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers around him, with tears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダルソンに敬礼を送る。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone... I'm sorry for everything until now...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ゆっくりと……休んでくれ……」
魔物将軍ダルソンの体が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The body of Monster General Dalson,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空気に溶けるようにかき消えた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: dissolved into the air as if melting away.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私達も最初は気づかなかったのだがな……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At first, we hadn’t realized either...
The general was grievously wounded 15 years ago,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
